title: Surface Cleaner Spray
description: Water based multipurpose spray for all surfaces for all surfaces, glass, car seat etc.
advantages: (-) Can be used on all surfaces since it is water based
(-) Reaches to all corners due to good spraying effect
(-) Cleanses all surfaces, gives better results
(-) Can be used in car, home at sitting area, wall, tyles, carpet, corridor, glass objects
how-to-use: It is a ready to use multipurpose spray. Keep about six-inch (or as per your requirement) distance away from surface to be sprayed. Wipe with soft cloth or sponge (depending upon surface).
